document.full_text: the lakers have more size, talent and big-game experience than the seventh-seeded hornets. but new orleans has proven to be a tricky opponent for coach phil jackson.
document.title: in jackson's finale, lakers' parting gift challenges his skills
lines_and_colors: the lakers have more size, talent and big-game experience than the seventh-seeded hornets. but new orleans has proven to be a tricky opponent for coach phil jackson.
